condition.description:
Obesity means having too much body fat. It is different from being overweight, which means weighing too much. The weight may come from muscle, bone, fat, and/or body water. Both terms mean that a person's weight is greater than what's considered healthy for his or her height.

Obesity occurs over time when you eat more calories than you use. The balance between calories-in and calories-out differs for each person. Factors that might affect your weight include your genetic makeup, overeating, eating high-fat foods, and not being physically active.

Being obese increases your risk of diabetes, heart disease, stroke, arthritis, and some cancers. If you are obese, losing even 5 to 10 percent of your weight can delay or prevent some of these diseases. For example, that means losing 10 to 20 pounds if you weigh 200 pounds.

NIH: National Institute of Diabetes and Digestive and Kidney Diseases
condition.name: Obesity

carousel_items: Don't take Methamphetamine in the evening or you won't be able to sleep.

If you're taking Methamphetamine for weight loss, take it 30 minutes before a meal. Methamphetamine can affect your concentration, so don't drive or do anything that requires concentration until you know how your body reacts to it.
Methamphetamine is only meant to be used for a few weeks since it can be habit-forming and lose its effectiveness.
Can cause reduced appetite, insomnia, and restlessness.

basics.benefits_moa: Methamphetamine is a stimulant. It treats attention-deficit/hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) and weight loss by increasing norepinephrine and dopamine activity in the brain.
basics.bottom_line: Methamphetamine is an effective and cheap medication used to treat ADHD, but it can be habit-forming and is not used for long-term treatment.
downsides: Only recommended for weight loss if other medications and plans haven't worked.
Only used for short-term treatment because it is habit-forming.
If you want to stop taking Methamphetamine, talk to your doctor since stopping can cause withdrawal symptoms.
Not safe for use in children younger than 12 years.

downsides_processed.orig: Only recommended for weight loss if other medications and plans haven't worked.
Only used for short-term treatment because it is habit-forming.
If you want to stop taking Methamphetamine, talk to your doctor since stopping can cause withdrawal symptoms.
Not safe for use in children younger than 12 years.

upsides: Recommended as a first-choice medication to treat ADHD in both adults and children.
Available as a generic, so it is cheaper than other medications to treat ADHD.

upsides_processed.orig: Recommended as a first-choice medication to treat ADHD in both adults and children.
Available as a generic, so it is cheaper than other medications to treat ADHD.

drugs.one_liner: Helps you focus and lose weight.

userStories.tip: I think for people predisposed to anger issues and those who are temperamental Methamphetamine may not be the best choice as I can attest.  I am one of those people and I became furious at the drop of a dime while on it. I quit 4-5 days in.

drugs.name: Desoxyn

carousel_items_processed.orig: Don't take Methamphetamine in the evening or you won't be able to sleep.

If you're taking Methamphetamine for weight loss, take it 30 minutes before a meal. Methamphetamine can affect your concentration, so don't drive or do anything that requires concentration until you know how your body reacts to it.
Methamphetamine is only meant to be used for a few weeks since it can be habit-forming and lose its effectiveness.
Can cause reduced appetite, insomnia, and restlessness.

risks_warnings.title: Serious or life-threatening cardiovascular events
risks_warnings.description: Methamphetamine has been associated with heart attack, stroke, and sudden death. Anyone with a history of heart problems shouldn't take it, and people should be screened for heart problems before starting it. Watch out for unexplained fainting or chest pain that comes on with physical activity.

description_processed.orig: Methamphetamine has been associated with heart attack, stroke, and sudden death. Anyone with a history of heart problems shouldn't take it, and people should be screened for heart problems before starting it. Watch out for unexplained fainting or chest pain that comes on with physical activity.

risks_warnings.title: Abuse and dependence
risks_warnings.description: Methamphetamine has a risk of abuse and dependence. Take only what's prescribed by a doctor to minimize risks of abuse and overdose. People with a history of drug abuse shouldn't take it.

description_processed.orig: Methamphetamine has a risk of abuse and dependence. Take only what's prescribed by a doctor to minimize risks of abuse and overdose. People with a history of drug abuse shouldn't take it.

risks_warnings.title: Aggressive behavior and psychosis
risks_warnings.description: Taking a stimulant like Methamphetamine can worsen or bring on psychiatric symptoms such as hallucinations, delusional thinking, and mania. It may also worsen or bring on aggressive behavior or hostility.

description_processed.orig: Taking a stimulant like Methamphetamine can worsen or bring on psychiatric symptoms such as hallucinations, delusional thinking, and mania. It may also worsen or bring on aggressive behavior or hostility.

risks_warnings.title: Long-term growth suppression
risks_warnings.description: Appetite suppression can occur. In clinical studies, long-term treatment with stimulants similar to Methamphetamine caused a temporary slowing of growth rate (both height and weight) in children who started the medication before they started puberty. Doctors should monitor children's growth during treatment.

description_processed.orig: Appetite suppression can occur. In clinical studies, long-term treatment with stimulants similar to Methamphetamine caused a temporary slowing of growth rate (both height and weight) in children who started the medication before they started puberty. Doctors should monitor children's growth during treatment.

risks_warnings.title: Seizures
risks_warnings.description: Methamphetamine can lower the brain's threshold for seizures in people with certain risk factors. Use with caution.

description_processed.orig: Methamphetamine can lower the brain's threshold for seizures in people with certain risk factors. Use with caution.

risks_warnings.title: Harm to fetus
risks_warnings.description: Methamphetamine can cause harm to your unborn baby and should only be used if the benefit is greater than the risk. If you're considering having a baby, talk to your doctor about alternative medications and don't use if you're breastfeeding.

description_processed.orig: Methamphetamine can cause harm to your unborn baby and should only be used if the benefit is greater than the risk. If you're considering having a baby, talk to your doctor about alternative medications and don't use if you're breastfeeding.

risks_warnings.title: Drug interactions
risks_warnings.description: Taking Methamphetamine when you've recently stopped taking monoamine oxidase inhibitors within the last two weeks can cause your blood pressure to rise very high. Go to the emergency room or talk to your doctor immediately if you feel dizzy or faint or have an extremely bad headache.
risk_factors: Taking MAO inhibitors, insulin and other high blood pressure medicine

description_processed.orig: Taking Methamphetamine when you've recently stopped taking monoamine oxidase inhibitors within the last two weeks can cause your blood pressure to rise very high. Go to the emergency room or talk to your doctor immediately if you feel dizzy or faint or have an extremely bad headache.

carousel_items: Follow dose adjustments set by your doctor to minimize skin rash.
Take with food to avoid upset stomach.
Report rash, blurry vision, fever, persistent headache, or neck stiffness to your doctor.
Makes hormonal birth control less effective.
Takes 4 to 6 weeks to feel full effects on mood.

basics.benefits_moa: Lamictal is an antiepileptic. Researchers don't know exactly how it works, but it seems to calm nerve activity in the brain.
basics.bottom_line: Lamictal is most useful for treating severe seizure disorders, and for bipolar disorder with more depression symptoms than manic symptoms. Just be careful to increase your dose slowly to avoid skin rash.
downsides: Can cause double vision, dizziness, sleepiness, and headache.
Has the risk of a rare but life-threatening rash.
Can make hormonal birth control less effective.
Might be less effective than other medicines for treating manic episodes (acute mania) in people with bipolar disorder.

downsides_processed.orig: Can cause double vision, dizziness, sleepiness, and headache.
Has the risk of a rare but life-threatening rash.
Can make hormonal birth control less effective.
Might be less effective than other medicines for treating manic episodes (acute mania) in people with bipolar disorder.

upsides: Effective at lowering the frequency of seizures in people with epilepsy or Lennox-Gestaut syndrome. Typically used together with other medications for severe seizure disorders.
Works best for partial, tonic-clonic, and absence seizures.
A first-line treatment for bipolar disorder. Effective long-term treatment for stabilizing mood. Prevents both depressive and manic episodes, but the effect is greater for preventing depression.
Doesn't require routine blood tests.

upsides_processed.orig: Effective at lowering the frequency of seizures in people with epilepsy or Lennox-Gestaut syndrome. Typically used together with other medications for severe seizure disorders.
Works best for partial, tonic-clonic, and absence seizures.
A first-line treatment for bipolar disorder. Effective long-term treatment for stabilizing mood. Prevents both depressive and manic episodes, but the effect is greater for preventing depression.
Doesn't require routine blood tests.

userStories.tip: At 200mg, I developed some really nasty forehead acne and my skin was extremely oily, even with cleaning 2x/day and retin-a. I finally saw a dermatologist who mentioned he's had patients suffer from lamictal-induced acne...not just a rash.

Weirdest/best side effect from any medicine goes to Lamictal - for the first couple weeks I had really intense and vivid movie-like dreams. It gives me horrible headaches but I take it before bed so I sleep through it.
It saved my life...but titrate slowly. Too high = what I call "woo woo's"; cerebral palsy-like symptoms (full body jerks, almost seizure like but fully aware & able to communicate).
Need to monitor for liver toxicity
Blurred vision, uncontrolled muscle jerks, shaking
Double Vision is really a hassle comes and goes. Tremors, have an unexpected jerk in my hand. Have knocked things over and off the stand, but helps control my anger.

The generic versions do not work. I found out the hard way - I was switched to the generic and ended up with a very bad depression. Things turned around once the insurance co approved the brand name. It is pricey.

userStories.identifier: Woman with PTSD and Bipolar II disorder
userStories.tip: Has changed my life in evening out my mood- no hypo mania but kind of miss feeling more motivated. Have trouble initiating and have to take a lot of countering supplements to deal with fuzzy brain. Worsening soluble vision is a problem.
Doctors don't tell you it causes double vision. Also can cause fuzzy thinking at higher doses- sometimes called "Lamictal Stupid."

stick with it for a little more time b4 you count it out /don't play with doses! it took at least 6mnths (after months of figuring out and getting up to right dose with my dr) for me to realize how much less severe & freqnt episodes were!
Take it slow. Don't expect overnight changes.
supresses libido at 75 mg

I feel great on lamotrigine. Other seizure drugs depressed me.
But... not all manufacturers' pills are the same. My pharmacist must give me pills from the same generic company. Glaxo-SK's Lamictal is one of the worst for me.
Splitting up dosages in the morning and evening helps with "smoothening" out the side effects such as dizziness. Definitely take the branded XR version. Generic Lamotrigine was horrible for me.

I was on Serezone for 10 years and stopped working. I augmented with Lamictal and it made a world of difference. I have a lot more energy and my outlook has changed.  As of 2 months ago, I am no longer on Serezone, just Lamictal. It is great
userStories.identifier: Active, in great shape, feel like 40

userStories.tip: Lamictal saved my life. However some of the side effects are annoying such as neck pain,problems with co-ordination, ( have had a few very bad falls) judging distances  ( parking is a nightmare) and some  minor.skin problems. Overall the side effects are worth it to me. My moods are very stable. Very rarely depressed or hypomanic. Life is good.
take it twice a day... the effects do not last for 24 hours and taking it twice a day evens out your experience.
Extended release version seems to have fewer side effects than immediate-release.  Best to take in a.m.

userStories.identifier: Someone who has struggled with dysthymia
userStories.tip: It took a little tinkering to find the dosage that worked best for me.

Must titer up and down slowly... comes in 50mg and 100mg intervals so you can gradually adjust the dosage until you get it right. I take between 200mg and 300mg. It's the only medication that has consistently controlled my mood swings.
this is the first medication that worked for both seizures and bipolar disorder. seriously a life saver.

I have a pretty atypical case of bipolar, but the lamictal really cuts down on the irritability. When I'm in the depths of my depression or super manic, I'm actually pleasant to be around and don't take everything super personally.

Worked wonders for mood stability, best ever.  Do not miss a dose or you will go through nasty withdrawal! Have immunoglobulin levels checked before starting & monitored, as it can cause an immune deficiency.
Double vision went away when I started taking Lamictal Xr instead of the regular type. Haven't experienced any other side effects.
It saved my life.
Really I don't fell any hassle, even when I left for some time, the only thing that happened is my mood didn't go very well.
Take it around the same time every day. I have to take mine in the morning and at night. Also taking it with food helps curb nausea & any possible drowsiness.
if you forget to take it for a day or two you'll be okay but youll begin to feel it, life saver

userStories.identifier: A semi-retired writer; used to be pharma
userStories.tip: I take it every 12 hours. Insomnia was a problem for a month or so; I adapted. A problem is manufacturer difference. Some cause seizures (dose too high), so I stick with one and need to check its ID every time I pick up a bottle.

drugs.name: Lamictal

carousel_items_processed.orig: Follow dose adjustments set by your doctor to minimize skin rash.
Take with food to avoid upset stomach.
Report rash, blurry vision, fever, persistent headache, or neck stiffness to your doctor.
Makes hormonal birth control less effective.
Takes 4 to 6 weeks to feel full effects on mood.

risks_warnings.title: Suicidal thoughts or behavior
risks_warnings.description: Lamictal may increase the risk of suicidal thoughts or behavior. Watch for worsening depression or any unusual changes in mood or behavior, especially during the first few months of treatment or when the dose changes. Report anything concerning to a doctor immediately.

description_processed.orig: Lamictal may increase the risk of suicidal thoughts or behavior. Watch for worsening depression or any unusual changes in mood or behavior, especially during the first few months of treatment or when the dose changes. Report anything concerning to a doctor immediately.

risks_warnings.title: Serious skin rash
risks_warnings.description: Rarely, Lamictal can cause a serious or life-threatening skin rash. The risk is higher for people who are also taking Depakote. Report any skin rashes to a doctor immediately.
risk_factors: Taking more than the prescribed dose

description_processed.orig: Rarely, Lamictal can cause a serious or life-threatening skin rash. The risk is higher for people who are also taking Depakote. Report any skin rashes to a doctor immediately.

risks_warnings.title: Serious allergic reactions
risks_warnings.description: Rarely, Lamictal can cause serious allergic reactions and life-threatening organ failure. Report any skin rash, fever, swelling, or trouble breathing to a doctor immediately.

description_processed.orig: Rarely, Lamictal can cause serious allergic reactions and life-threatening organ failure. Report any skin rash, fever, swelling, or trouble breathing to a doctor immediately.

risks_warnings.title: Blood disorders
risks_warnings.description: Rarely, Lamictal can lower white blood cell counts. White blood cells help your body fight infections. Tell your doctor if you have any infection symptoms (such as fever, sore throat, or mouth/throat swelling) that don't go away.

description_processed.orig: Rarely, Lamictal can lower white blood cell counts. White blood cells help your body fight infections. Tell your doctor if you have any infection symptoms (such as fever, sore throat, or mouth/throat swelling) that don't go away.

risks_warnings.title: Meningitis
risks_warnings.description: Rarely, Lamictal can cause meningitis, a serious inflammation of the lining around the brain. This can occur from six weeks after starting the medication to whenever you stop taking it. If you have any sudden rash, fever, sensitivity to light, neck stiffness, headache, nausea, or vomiting, tell your doctor immediately.

description_processed.orig: Rarely, Lamictal can cause meningitis, a serious inflammation of the lining around the brain. This can occur from six weeks after starting the medication to whenever you stop taking it. If you have any sudden rash, fever, sensitivity to light, neck stiffness, headache, nausea, or vomiting, tell your doctor immediately.

risks_warnings.title: Interactions with birth control pills
risks_warnings.description: Taking birth control pills may lower the amount of Lamictal in your body. Stopping birth control pills may suddenly increase the amount of Lamictal in your body. This can be dangerous. Talk to your doctor if you're taking birth control pills, or if you're thinking about starting or stopping them.

description_processed.orig: Taking birth control pills may lower the amount of Lamictal in your body. Stopping birth control pills may suddenly increase the amount of Lamictal in your body. This can be dangerous. Talk to your doctor if you're taking birth control pills, or if you're thinking about starting or stopping them.

risks_warnings.title: Withdrawal seizures
risks_warnings.description: Stopping Lamictal suddenly can increase the number of seizures. If you want to stop taking Lamictal, talk to your doctor before making any changes. It’s safer to slowly lower your dose of the drug over at least one week before completely stopping.

description_processed.orig: Stopping Lamictal suddenly can increase the number of seizures. If you want to stop taking Lamictal, talk to your doctor before making any changes. It’s safer to slowly lower your dose of the drug over at least one week before completely stopping.

carousel_items: For the first week, avoid activities that require you to be alert.
Don't use if pregnant.
Can cause tingling skin sensations and reduced appetite.
Report any confusion, decreased sweating, fever, or changes in behavior or vision.
Takes 3 to 4 weeks to feel full effects on mood.

clock.tip: Works slower when taken with food.

basics.benefits_moa: Topamax is an antiepileptic. Researchers don't know exactly how it works, but it seems to affect multiple parts of the brain to control seizures and migraines.
basics.bottom_line: Topamax is useful for preventing seizures and migraines, and doesn't require blood tests while you're on it.
downsides: Can cause sleepiness, speech problems, tingling sensations, and weight loss.
A few people will get kidney stones.
Not safe to use if you're pregnant.

downsides_processed.orig: Can cause sleepiness, speech problems, tingling sensations, and weight loss.
A few people will get kidney stones.
Not safe to use if you're pregnant.

upsides: Used on its own or with other antiepileptic medicines to lower the frequency of seizures, especially for people with tonic-clonic or partial seizures, or Lennox-Gestaut syndrome.
Helpful in preventing frequent migraine headaches.
Doesn't need routine blood tests.

upsides_processed.orig: Used on its own or with other antiepileptic medicines to lower the frequency of seizures, especially for people with tonic-clonic or partial seizures, or Lennox-Gestaut syndrome.
Helpful in preventing frequent migraine headaches.
Doesn't need routine blood tests.

userStories.tip: Went from 4-5 migraines a week to 1-2 a month.  Have the tingling and did experiencing weight loss; tingling in feet comes and goes, never completely gone for years now.  Overall would take the 'pins and needles' over a migraine.

userStories.identifier: full time employee, part time student
userStories.tip: Caused abdominal pain, diarrhea and weight loss for the first month.  Caused cognitive problems - couldn't concentrate and would completely blank on certain words, specifically names.
This works better than any of the anti-depressants I've tried (even though they're not in the same category) and the weight loss is a nice bonus!

Taken for 3 years & have finally found the best balance of keeping my old 400mg daily dosage but split up twice a day (morning & night) to avoid the dreaded "DOPE-A-MAX" as my Doctor hilariously calls the word finding brain fog side effect.

Still get migraines but they're tolerable headaches usually and don't even require pain meds. Tingling subsided after a couple of months. Minor brain fog worth the migraine abatement. Don't mind the weight loss either.

I really took for bipolar but helps w sezuire which I had too but I stop cause it made me unstable on feet I fell few times ...had Brian fog ...I blackout few times not worth it there other treatments for both never work on the pain
Worked great for my migraines but the side effects out weighed the pros. Tingling all over, loss of appetite, I couldn't taste and anything carbonated tasted flat, and on and off brain fog.

Pros:  50 mg Topamax per day seemed to make my 3-6 migraines per month shallower, shorter, and less painful.  I also lost weight - nice!  However, I stopped taking it after a year because it was making me too tired and depressed.
Definitely reduced my appetite, but for me it's absolutely worth it for the almost perfect migraine prevention.
I take it for MS-associated nerve pain, not diabetes, but the option wasn't there. Be careful about dosage, especially if you're taking with other meds that make you sleepy.

userStories.identifier: active young professional with no kids
userStories.tip: When I started taking Topamax I was only on 50mg a day but after being on it for over a year I need to take 100mg for it to work well for me.

I take it in the evening, since it makes me sleepy - and since I have to take it daily, at the same time, I just synced it with my birth control pill. Easy-peasy.

So far it's drastically reduced my migraines. Tingly feet, though.
Topamax reduces number of full blown migraines.  Results in low energy and slower mental functions.  Till have to take nine abortives each month.
userStories.identifier: 77 year old male with low energy.

userStories.satisfaction: Not worth it, thinking about stopping
userStories.tip: I took Topamax for a year for seizures. While it worked (I didn't have any seizures until I cut my dose myself), I was living in an endless brain fog. My family said I was like a zombie. I had no ambition or emotion.
Taking it in the evening helped with fatigue. Tingling was worth the decrease in migraines.

userStories.satisfaction: Not worth it, thinking about stopping
userStories.tip: This was the drug I will never use again for migraines. It doesn't work and has too many side effects.
I have been taking this medicine for a decade without any problems
Start with low dose but you have to increase over time
Felt absolutely terrible for first week on this stuff. After that, I felt completely normal again. Kick-started my stalled weight loss.
Took for 6 months for migraines. Had same amount of migraine if not more. Horrible pain in my arms. Severe brain fog. Couldn't stand the side effects even if the drug had worked.
userStories.identifier: Migraines over 20 years. High stress job
wife, happy, travel and enjoy friends
userStories.tip: take one at night, one in the morning

1-It will affect concentration so take at night
2- It will affect your kidneys so get bloodwork done regularly
3- It will affect your mood at high doses

Don't use if pregnant.
Can cause tingling skin sensations and reduced appetite.
Report any confusion, decreased sweating, fever, or changes in behavior or vision.

risks_warnings.title: Suicidal thoughts or behavior
risks_warnings.description: Topamax may increase the risk of suicidal thoughts or behavior. Watch for worsening depression or any unusual changes in mood or behavior, especially during the first few months of treatment or when the dose changes. Report anything concerning to a doctor immediately.

description_processed.orig: Topamax may increase the risk of suicidal thoughts or behavior. Watch for worsening depression or any unusual changes in mood or behavior, especially during the first few months of treatment or when the dose changes. Report anything concerning to a doctor immediately.

risks_warnings.title: Pregnancy
risks_warnings.description: Topamax may cause birth defects. If you're considering having a baby, talk to your doctor about alternative medications.

description_processed.orig: Topamax may cause birth defects. If you're considering having a baby, talk to your doctor about alternative medications.

risks_warnings.title: Uncontrolled body temperature
risks_warnings.description: Topamax can cause high body temperature and decreased sweating. Monitor your body temperature during strenuous exercise or exposure to high outside temperatures.

description_processed.orig: Topamax can cause high body temperature and decreased sweating. Monitor your body temperature during strenuous exercise or exposure to high outside temperatures.

risks_warnings.title: Mental changes due to high ammonia
risks_warnings.description: Topamax may cause increased ammonia in the body. Tell your doctor if you notice any confusion, weakness, or vomiting.

description_processed.orig: Topamax may cause increased ammonia in the body. Tell your doctor if you notice any confusion, weakness, or vomiting.

risks_warnings.title: Kidney stones
risks_warnings.description: Topamax may increase your risk for kidney stones. Stay well-hydrated to lower your risk.

description_processed.orig: Topamax may increase your risk for kidney stones. Stay well-hydrated to lower your risk.

risks_warnings.title: Vision problems
risks_warnings.description: Topamax can cause eye pain, blurry vision, or narrow vision. Vision problems can happen any time while taking this medication. Tell your doctor if you have any changes in your vision.

description_processed.orig: Topamax can cause eye pain, blurry vision, or narrow vision. Vision problems can happen any time while taking this medication. Tell your doctor if you have any changes in your vision.

risks_warnings.title: Withdrawal seizures
risks_warnings.description: Stopping Topamax suddenly can increase the number of seizures. If you want to stop taking Topamax, talk to your doctor before making any changes. It’s safer to slowly lower your dose of the drug over at least one week before completely stopping.

description_processed.orig: Stopping Topamax suddenly can increase the number of seizures. If you want to stop taking Topamax, talk to your doctor before making any changes. It’s safer to slowly lower your dose of the drug over at least one week before completely stopping.

carousel_items: This should only be used for a few weeks to help you lose weight along with diet and exercise.
You can feel dizzy the first few days you take it, so be careful driving or doing anything where you need to focus.
Take it early in the day so you don't have problems sleeping.
Take this before or 1 to 2 hours after your breakfast.

clock.tip: Take before breakfast or 1 to 2 hours after breakfast.

basics.benefits_moa: Phentermine is an appetite suppressant. It lowers your appetite and has a stimulating effect, which can make you want to exercise more and help you lose weight.
basics.bottom_line: Phentermine can help you lose weight, but most insurance companies don't cover it, and you shouldn't use it long-term.
downsides: Even though Phentermine is available as a generic, most insurance companies don't cover it, so you may have to pay for it out of pocket.
Can only be used for 12 weeks since you can develop tolerance.
Not a first-line treatment for losing weight.

downsides_processed.orig: Even though Phentermine is available as a generic, most insurance companies don't cover it, so you may have to pay for it out of pocket.
Can only be used for 12 weeks since you can develop tolerance.
Not a first-line treatment for losing weight.

upsides: Lowers appetite.
Can increase your ability to exercise and how long you're able to exercise.
Available as a combo with topiramate as Qsymia, which is recommended more highly, but it's still not that effective.

upsides_processed.orig: Lowers appetite.
Can increase your ability to exercise and how long you're able to exercise.
Available as a combo with topiramate as Qsymia, which is recommended more highly, but it's still not that effective.

userStories.tip: Take it in the morning on an empty stomach.  Don't eat for at least 1 hour after.  Make sure to eat enough calories during the day.  Eat healthier, High protein and low carbs/sugar.  Don't worry about fats /fat free. Exercise.  Drink water.
Taking it in the morning is less disruptive to sleep patterns than taking it later in the day, but still an issue.

userStories.satisfaction: Not worth it, thinking about stopping
userStories.tip: taking it for about 5 weeks. No noticeable decrease in appetite as expected/promised by prescribing dr.
Caused extreme anxiety. Take in the morning.
Definitely take in the morning. Some urine retention feeling,  but in issues.
Use GoodRx to get the best price - likely not covered by your insurance.

drugs.name: phentermine

carousel_items_processed.orig: This should only be used for a few weeks to help you lose weight along with diet and exercise.
You can feel dizzy the first few days you take it, so be careful driving or doing anything where you need to focus.
Take it early in the day so you don't have problems sleeping.
Take this before or 1 to 2 hours after your breakfast.

risks_warnings.title: High blood pressure in the lungs
risks_warnings.description: People on Phentermine have reported high blood pressure in the lungs. This has been very rare. Symptoms include trouble breathing, chest pain, swelling in your legs, and fainting spells. If you notice a sudden decrease in how much you can exercise, talk to your doctor immediately.

description_processed.orig: People on Phentermine have reported high blood pressure in the lungs. This has been very rare. Symptoms include trouble breathing, chest pain, swelling in your legs, and fainting spells. If you notice a sudden decrease in how much you can exercise, talk to your doctor immediately.

risks_warnings.title: Tolerance
risks_warnings.description: Taking Phentermine for weight loss is only meant for a few weeks at the most, since your body can become used to the medication, and then it stops working. Taking more than what your doctor tells you to take will not help. Talk to your doctor about how to use this to help you lose weight along with diet and exercise.

description_processed.orig: Taking Phentermine for weight loss is only meant for a few weeks at the most, since your body can become used to the medication, and then it stops working. Taking more than what your doctor tells you to take will not help. Talk to your doctor about how to use this to help you lose weight along with diet and exercise.

risks_warnings.title: Abuse
risks_warnings.description: Phentermine can have the potential to be abused, especially if you're taking it differently than what the doctor or pharmacist tells you to. Doing this can also cause you to have withdrawal symptoms. This medication is only meant to be used for a short time. Talk to your doctor about alternatives if this is an issue.

description_processed.orig: Phentermine can have the potential to be abused, especially if you're taking it differently than what the doctor or pharmacist tells you to. Doing this can also cause you to have withdrawal symptoms. This medication is only meant to be used for a short time. Talk to your doctor about alternatives if this is an issue.

risks_warnings.title: Increase in blood pressure
risks_warnings.description: Phentermine can increase your blood pressure which can be a problem if you have high blood pressure. Talk to your doctor if changes need to be made in the medications you take for your blood pressure.

description_processed.orig: Phentermine can increase your blood pressure which can be a problem if you have high blood pressure. Talk to your doctor if changes need to be made in the medications you take for your blood pressure.

risks_warnings.title: Low blood sugar
risks_warnings.description: Phentermine can cause you to have low blood sugar, especially if you have diabetes. Talk to your doctor if changes need to be made to the medications you take for your diabetes.

description_processed.orig: Phentermine can cause you to have low blood sugar, especially if you have diabetes. Talk to your doctor if changes need to be made to the medications you take for your diabetes.

risks_warnings.title: Changes in sex drive
risks_warnings.description: Phentermine can cause changes in your sex drive, including impotence in men. Talk to your doctor if this bothers you.

description_processed.orig: Phentermine can cause changes in your sex drive, including impotence in men. Talk to your doctor if this bothers you.

points.name: Primary pulmonary hypertension and/or regurgitant cardiac valvular disease

carousel_items: Can cause upset stomach with nausea and especially diarrhea in the first couple of weeks.
Always take it with food or switch to the extended release version to avoid upset stomach.
Tell your doctor about any deep or rapid breathing, or persistent nausea, vomiting, and stomach pain.
Check your blood sugar regularly.

clock.tip: Works faster if taken with food.

basics.benefits_moa: Metformin is an anti-diabetic drug. It lowers sugar production in your body, decreases sugar absorption in your intestines, and makes your body more sensitive to insulin.
basics.bottom_line: Metformin is a very effective medicine to lower blood sugar and the risk of complications and death from diabetes, but it's likely to cause diarrhea for the first few weeks.
downsides: Most people will have nausea, indigestion, or diarrhea in the first few weeks. You can minimize this if you take it on a full stomach.
People with poor kidney function can't use it.
Only works if your body can still make your own insulin, a hormone that tells your body what to do with sugar, protein, and fat.

downsides_processed.orig: Most people will have nausea, indigestion, or diarrhea in the first few weeks. You can minimize this if you take it on a full stomach.
People with poor kidney function can't use it.
Only works if your body can still make your own insulin, a hormone that tells your body what to do with sugar, protein, and fat.

upsides: Oral blood sugar-lowering medicine.
A common first treatment for people with newly-diagnosed Type 2 diabetes.
The only oral diabetes medicine that lowers complications and deaths from conditions related to diabetes.
Lowers A1c levels by 1-2%. (Hemoglobin A1c measures your average blood sugar over time.)
Prevents the harmful effects of high sugar levels on your organs and blood vessels.
Also lowers certain lipid (fat and cholesterol) levels.
Unlike some diabetes medicines, doesn't cause weight gain or low blood sugar.
You don't have to check your blood sugar every day with this medicine.
One of the least expensive diabetes medicines.

upsides_processed.orig: Oral blood sugar-lowering medicine.
A common first treatment for people with newly-diagnosed Type 2 diabetes.
The only oral diabetes medicine that lowers complications and deaths from conditions related to diabetes.
Lowers A1c levels by 1-2%. (Hemoglobin A1c measures your average blood sugar over time.)
Prevents the harmful effects of high sugar levels on your organs and blood vessels.
Also lowers certain lipid (fat and cholesterol) levels.
Unlike some diabetes medicines, doesn't cause weight gain or low blood sugar.
You don't have to check your blood sugar every day with this medicine.
One of the least expensive diabetes medicines.

userStories.tip: s/e of flatulence and stool changes a firstt
It works so-so for me

With its 900mg twice a day dosage in my case you'd be definitely prone to side effects. Have found diet control plus exercise to be a much better option. I now take one dosage every three days just as a precautionary measure.

I think it has helped but I also took lots of hormones at the same time so it is hard to pin down exactly what helped my symptoms. Be very careful with alcohol...I had a couple of bad experiences even after just 2 glasses of wine.
After taking it for three weeks and feeling very good, I developed a massive rash that itched so badly I was ready to claw my skin off. Too bad.  It was really working for me.
userStories.satisfaction: Not worth it, thinking about stopping

userStories.tip: If you are having GI issues while taking it, try drinking more water with the dosage.
If prescribed by your doctor to take a larger dose, take it after your evening meal. Rather than in the morning. I find that this is less likely to cause stomach issues.
I take it morning and night with meals, it's like taking my vitamins. Not hard at all. I test my blood sugar 6 times a day or more. Before/after every meal. Only side effect I have had is gas.
very cheap, effective, no side effects after first 1-2 weeks

Start dose low and escalate slowly. Expect mild nausea at start and with dose increases. It will go away, so stick with it. I feel fine now. I am convinced that this medicine also helped me lose weight too, thus improving my glucose #s.
userStories.identifier: Physician with new diagnosis of diabetes

drugs.name: Metformin

carousel_items_processed.orig: Can cause upset stomach with nausea and especially diarrhea in the first couple of weeks.
Always take it with food or switch to the extended release version to avoid upset stomach.
Tell your doctor about any deep or rapid breathing, or persistent nausea, vomiting, and stomach pain.
Check your blood sugar regularly.

risks_warnings.title: Death from lactic acid build up (Lactic acidosis)
risks_warnings.description: Metformin can cause this rare but life-threatening condition. Symptoms include deep and rapid breathing, nausea, vomiting, and stomach pain. This is a medical emergency and you should get help right away. Baseline blood work for kidney and liver function are helpful to see if you can use Metformin. It may not be a good choice for people with kidney problems. Metformin should be stopped 48 hours before and/or after surgery or any imaging procedure needing contrast dye.

description_processed.orig: Metformin can cause this rare but life-threatening condition. Symptoms include deep and rapid breathing, nausea, vomiting, and stomach pain. This is a medical emergency and you should get help right away. Baseline blood work for kidney and liver function are helpful to see if you can use Metformin. It may not be a good choice for people with kidney problems. Metformin should be stopped 48 hours before and/or after surgery or any imaging procedure needing contrast dye.

risks_warnings.title: Low red blood cell count (Megaloblastic anemia )
risks_warnings.description: Metformin can cause a rare type of anemia with large, immature red blood cells but not enough healthy ones. Let your doctor know about any persistent low energy, muscle weakness, low appetite, tingling or numbness on hands/feet. A blood test can help determine if you have anemia and if Metformin is the reason.

description_processed.orig: Metformin can cause a rare type of anemia with large, immature red blood cells but not enough healthy ones. Let your doctor know about any persistent low energy, muscle weakness, low appetite, tingling or numbness on hands/feet. A blood test can help determine if you have anemia and if Metformin is the reason.
